title: Sample, ca. 1944
medium:
Medium: synthetic yarns, metallic yarns metallic strips, plastic strips
Technique: 2/2 twill weave with single and paired warps
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 20 x 21 cm (7 7/8 x 8 1/4 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Twill plaid in two shades of green, pale blue and silver. Warps are even stripes of green bouclé and light blue yarn. Weft has bands of green bouclé and flat silver metallic strip, wrapped silver metallic yarn, and braided clear plastic strips. Selvage at left side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1944.
ca. 1944. Medium: synthetic yarns, metallic yarns metallic strips, plastic strips
